<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Cernunnos (The Horned Lord)](/Deities.aspx?ID=116)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Protect forests and other natural areas, advocate for animals and plants, take and commit to decisive actions

**Anathema** Fail to strike down evil, enable the destruction of wilderness, needlessly kill animals

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, CG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Favored Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)

**Domains** [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=47), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=10)

- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172)

</column>
name: Cernunnos (The Horned Lord)
